description: PressMate AI creates a brand‑compliant press release from an internal briefing, generates SEO keywords, drafts, proofreads, formats, builds a media list, and schedules publication on PRNewswire at the requested time.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that converts internal briefings, corporate style guides, and SEO keywords into fully‑drafted, brand‑compliant press releases, then can generate media lists and schedule distribution.

We need a press release for the launch of our new AI‑powered analytics platform, called InsightX. The launch event is on March 15, 2025, at our San Francisco headquarters. Please use our corporate style guide at https://example.com/styleguide.json and target SEO keywords for AI analytics in English. After drafting, proofread, format as HTML, generate a media list for tech journalists in North America (max 10 contacts), and schedule the release on PRNewswire at 09:00 GMT tomorrow.

messages.content:
Headline: InsightX Launch – Revolutionizing AI‑Powered Analytics

San Francisco, CA – March 15, 2025 – Today, Acme Corp announced the launch of InsightX, an AI‑powered analytics platform designed to turn massive data streams into actionable business intelligence. InsightX leverages cutting‑edge machine learning to deliver real‑time data visualization and predictive insights.

"InsightX will redefine how enterprises turn data into actionable insights," said Jane Doe, CEO of Acme Corp. "Our platform empowers organizations to make smarter decisions faster, fueling growth and innovation."

Key features include:
- AI‑driven predictive modeling
- Interactive dashboards with real‑time data visualization
- Seamless integration with existing enterprise systems

For more information, visit https://acme.com/insightx.

Keywords: AI analytics, business intelligence, data visualization, machine learning analytics, InsightX platform.
